name: Souls (itch) (Dezarius)
description:
This was my first Game Jam (Ludum Dare 44 :) ). This is also my first actuall "complete" Game.

It's a game about stealing Souls from Enemys and investing them to gain POWER!

Have Fun ;) 

Tools:
Unity, Photoshop, BeepBox.co , Bfxr

Controls:
WASD/Arrows - Movement
Space/Left Mouse Button - Fire
E - Interact
R - Restart
